3g.title: Extensions of network protocols for 3G/LTE
3g.description: Support for Turris Omnia and Turris MOX LTE pack.

datacollect.description: Software for participation in data collection and distributed adaptive firewall.

survey.title: Usage Survey
survey.description: Collect data about router usage (installed packages, Internet connection type and etc.).

dynfw.description: Add firewall rules to block attackers detected by Turris collection network.

fwlogs.description: Collect logs from firewall for attempted connections.

minipot.description: Minimal honeypots to catch attackers for various protocols.

haas.description: SSH honeypot using Honeypot as a Service (haas.nic.cz).

atlas.description: Global platform, which measures Internet connectivity and reachability.
